mapper.select: select REMAIN_MONEY as remainMoney,REMAIN_POINTS as remainPoints from TB_CUSTOM_STORED where STATUS=0 and UID=#{uId}
select STOREDCATEGORY_ID as storedCategoryId,STORED_MONEY as storedMoney,RETURN_POINTS as returnPoints,REMARK as remark from TB_STORED_CATEGORY where STATUS=0 ORDER BY storedMoney DESC

select b.STOREDCATEGORY_ID as storedCategoryId,b.STORED_MONEY as storedMoney,b.RETURN_POINTS as returnPoints,a.WECHATPAY_MONEY as weChatPayMoney,a.ALIPAY_MONEY as aliPayMoney,a.BANKPAY_MONEY as bankPayMoney,a.CASHPAY_MONEY as cashPayMoney,a.CREATE_TIME as creatTime, a.TYPE as type, a.MONEY as money, a.POINTS as points FROM TB_STORED_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN TB_STORED_CATEGORY b ON a.STORED_CATEGORY_ID=b.STOREDCATEGORY_ID WHERE a.UID=#{uId} AND a.STATUS=0 ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT STOREDCATEGORY_ID AS storedCategoryId,STORED_MONEY AS storedMoney,RETURN_POINTS AS returnPoints FROM TB_STORED_CATEGORY WHERE STATUS=0 AND STOREDCATEGORY_ID=#{STOREDCATEGORY_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STORED_DETAIL( STOREDDETAIL_ID, UID, STORED_CATEGORY_ID, CREATE_TIME, WECHATPAY_MONEY, STATUS, TYPE, MONEY, POINTS )VALUES( #{STOREDDETAIL_ID}, #{UID}, #{STORED_CATEGORY_ID}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{WECHATPAY_MONEY}, #{STATUS}, #{TYPE}, #{MONEY}, #{POINTS} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_STORED_DETAIL SET STATUS=0 WHERE STOREDDETAIL_ID=#{out_trade_no}

UPDATE TB_CUSTOM_STORED SET REMAIN_MONEY=REMAIN_MONEY+( SELECT STORED_MONEY FROM TB_STORED_CATEGORY WHERE STATUS=0 AND STOREDCATEGORY_ID=( SELECT STORED_CATEGORY_ID FROM TB_STORED_DETAIL WHERE STATUS =0 AND STOREDDETAIL_ID=#{outTradeNo} ) ), REMAIN_POINTS=REMAIN_POINTS+( SELECT RETURN_POINTS FROM TB_STORED_CATEGORY WHERE STATUS=0 AND STOREDCATEGORY_ID=( SELECT STORED_CATEGORY_ID FROM TB_STORED_DETAIL WHERE STATUS =0 AND STOREDDETAIL_ID=#{outTradeNo} ) ) WHERE UID=#{uId}
mapper.select: SELECT STOREDDETAIL_ID as storedDetailId, UID as uId, STORED_CATEGORY_ID as storedCategoryId, STORE_ID as storeId, STAFF_ID as staffId, CREATE_TIME as createTime, WECHATPAY_MONEY as weChatPayMoney, ALIPAY_MONEY as aliPayMoney, BANKPAY_MONEY as bankPayMoney, CASHPAY_MONEY as cashPayMoney, REMARK as remark, STATUS as status FROM TB_STORED_DETAIL WHERE STOREDDETAIL_ID=#{out_trade_no}

SELECT PHONE as phone, UID as uId, CARD_ID as cardId, REMAIN_MONEY as remainMoney, REMAIN_POINTS as remainPoints, NAME as name, STATUS as status FROM TB_CUSTOM_STORED WHERE STATUS =0 AND UID=#{storedDetailuId}
